body_html:
Yes, the hidden and input dimensions are different in RNN, but they both share the batch_size dimension. For any NN structures, batch should be an independent dimension.
I don't understand why it becomes unclear just because the other two dimensions differ.
body_text:
Yes, the hidden and input dimensions are different in RNN, but they both share the batch_size dimension. For any NN structures, batch should be an independent dimension.
I don't understand why it becomes unclear just because the other two dimensions differ.
body:
Yes, the hidden and input dimensions are different in RNN, but they both share the `batch_size` dimension. For any NN structures, `batch` should be an independent dimension.
I don't understand why it becomes unclear just because the other two dimensions differ.
